title: Evenepoel Fears Long Road Back and Disrupted Tour de France Prep: ‘I’m Able to do Almost Nothing’
content:
Evenepoel receives successful surgery and discharged from hospital after training crash but faces slow rehab for devastated shoulder.

Read the full article at Evenepoel Fears Long Road Back and Disrupted Tour de France Prep: ‘I’m Able to do Almost Nothing’ on Velo.
